DOC.brief_summary: In this randomized study the investigators wish to explore the role of pre-procedural statin therapy for the prevention of contrast induced nephropathy in patients with moderate-to-severe renal dysfunction, submitted to elective coronary or angioplasty.
DOC.brief_title: Statins for Prevention of Contrast Induced Nephropathy
DOC.criteria: patients with preangiographic estimated creatinine clearance < 60 ml/min contrast medium administration within the previous 10 days endstage renal failure requiring dialysis refusal to give informed consent previous therapy with statin
